data.lyric:
[ti:The Man]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Man - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.10]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Joel Little
[00:00.21]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Joel Little
[00:00.32]I would be complex
[00:02.30]I would be cool
[00:04.51]They'd say I played the field
[00:05.83]Before I found someone to commit to
[00:08.91]And that would be okay for me to do
[00:13.26]Every conquest I had made would make me more of a boss to you
[00:18.90]I'd be a fearless leader
[00:21.10]I'd be an alpha type
[00:23.22]When everyone believes ya
[00:25.88]What's that like
[00:26.95]I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[00:31.58]Wondering if I'd get there quicker if I was a man
[00:35.30]And I'm so sick of them coming at me again
[00:39.74]'Cause if I was a man then I'd be the man
[00:43.75]I'd be the man
[00:48.14]I'd be the man
[00:52.61]They'd say I hustled put in the work
[00:56.92]They wouldn't shake their heads and question
[00:58.96]How much of this I deserve
[01:01.25]What I was wearing if I was rude
[01:05.68]Could all be separated from my good ideas and power moves
[01:11.26]And they would toast to me oh let the players play
[01:15.68]I'd be just like Leo in Saint-Tropez
[01:19.40]I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[01:23.95]Wondering if I'd get there quicker if I was a man
[01:27.75]And I'm so sick of them coming at me again
[01:32.01]'Cause if I was a man then I'd be the man
[01:36.17]I'd be the man
[01:40.54]I'd be the man
[01:44.10]What's it like to brag about raking in dollars
[01:46.78]And getting b***hes and models
[01:48.95]And it's all good if you're bad
[01:51.14]And it's okay if you're mad
[01:53.41]If I was out flashing my dollars
[01:55.49]I'd be a b***h not a baller
[01:57.78]They paint me out to be bad
[01:59.91]So it's okay that I'm mad
[02:02.97]I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[02:07.62]Wondering if I'd get there quicker if I was a man
[02:10.87]You know that
[02:11.49]And I'm so sick of them coming at me again
[02:15.70]'Cause if I was a man then I'd be the man
[02:20.28]And I'm so sick of running as fast as I can
[02:24.99]Wondering if I'd get there quicker if I was a man
[02:28.86]And I'm so sick of them coming at me again
[02:33.13]'Cause if I was a man then I'd be the man
[02:37.28]I'd be the man
[02:41.63]I'd be the man
[02:45.97]I'd be the man
[02:50.24]I'd be the man
[02:53.61]I'd be the man
[02:57.24]If I was a man I'd be the man
data.trans:
[ti:The Man]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.10]//
[00:00.21]//
[00:00.32]我令人难以捉摸
[00:02.30]我也桀骜不驯
[00:04.51]他们说我没找到值得托付的人之前
[00:05.83]我遍地撒网 四处留情
[00:08.91]对我而言 这样做也无可厚非
[00:13.26]我的每一个辉煌战绩都将给我增添一分驾驭你的实力
[00:18.90]我会成为无畏的领袖
[00:21.10]我会成为先驱人物
[00:23.22]每个人对你深信不疑 唯命是从 
[00:25.88]那是何等恣意潇洒
[00:26.95]我已疲于奔命 耗尽全身力气
[00:31.58]如果我是个男人 不知道我能否更快到达终点
[00:35.30]我受够了人们对我横加指责
[00:39.74]因为如果我是个男人 我就是人中翘楚
[00:43.75]我就是人中翘楚
[00:48.14]我就是人中翘楚
[00:52.61]这样他们会说我尽职尽责为事业打拼
[00:56.92]就不会摇头质疑
[00:58.96]我是否配得上所获得的声名成就
[01:01.25]也不会过分关注我的仪表和行为举止
[01:05.68]从而忽略了我卓越的想法和魄力之举
[01:11.26]他们也会为我举杯 让乐手奏响音乐
[01:15.68]我就像在圣特罗佩的Leo一样自在潇洒
[01:19.40]我已疲于奔命 耗尽全身力气
[01:23.95]如果我是个男人 不知道我能否更快到达终点
[01:27.75]我受够了人们对我横加指责
[01:32.01]因为如果我是个男人 我就是人中翘楚
[01:36.17]我就是人中翘楚
[01:40.54]我就是人中翘楚
[01:44.10]有的人整日吹嘘万贯家财是何等得意
[01:46.78]身边莺莺燕燕 美女如云
[01:48.95]如果你诡谲多变 那更迷人
[01:51.14]如果你盛气凌人 那叫真性情
[01:53.41]如果我在外面肆意挥霍钱财 
[01:55.49]那我就是不知廉耻 算不得什么人物
[01:57.78]他们众口铄金说我是坏人 
[01:59.91]那我便兴风作浪 也不为过吧
[02:02.97]我已疲于奔命 耗尽全身力气
[02:07.62]如果我是个男人 不知道我能否更快到达终点
[02:10.87]你明白的
[02:11.49]我受够了人们对我横加指责
[02:15.70]因为如果我是个男人 我就是人中翘楚
[02:20.28]我已疲于奔命 耗尽全身力气
[02:24.99]如果我是个男人 不知道我能否更快到达终点
[02:28.86]我受够了人们对我横加指责
[02:33.13]因为如果我是个男人 我就是人中翘楚
